author: Helix Consulting LLC
title: Flights canceled or delayed at Yerevan airport due to bad weather - Panorama | Armenian news
text:
Flights canceled or delayed at Yerevan airport due to bad weather
A number of flights have been canceled or delayed at Yerevan’s Zvartnots International Airport due to adverse weather starting from Thursday night.
The flights from Athens, Vienna and Warsaw have been cancelled, while the Moscow-Yerevan and Min Vody-Yerevan flights have been delayed, Zvartnots Airport spokesperson Lusine Moghrovyan told Panorama.am.
"At this point, visibility remains low due to fog, prompting flight cancellations from Zvartnots," she added.
